units-of-measure
About

Gradle Installation

units-of-measure is distributed as a Gradle plugin.
Creating a separate Gradle module for units-of-measure is highly recommended.

Current version:

build.gradle
see full example on GitHub

settings.gradle
see full example on GitHub

uoms/build.gradle
see full example on GitHub

uoms/units-of-measure.gradle
see full example on GitHub

myapp/build.gradle
see full example on GitHub

Because units-of-measure generates a DSL for you, it does not magically work out of the box.
You need to tell it what you want it to generate. This is done in the uoms/units-of-measure.gradle configuration file.


‹ Benefit: Safe Flexibility Configuration ›
